entity.name: project_basic_data
entity.query: select concat('pbd_', id) as id,create_time,update_time,project_id,project_name,pre_sell_license_id,country_name,country_id,agree_name,agree_id,layout_name,layout_id,project_address,developer,developer_id,division,section_id,total_cost_area,total_build_area,qualification_licence_no,usagee from project_basic_data
entity.deltaImportQuery: select concat('pbd_', id) as id,create_time,update_time,project_id,project_name,pre_sell_license_id,country_name,country_id,agree_name,agree_id,layout_name,layout_id,project_address,developer,developer_id,division,section_id,total_cost_area,total_build_area,qualification_licence_no,usagee from project_basic_data where id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: pre_sell_license_data
entity.query: select concat('psld_', id) as id,create_time,update_time,pre_sell_license_id,building_count,building_house,built_house,current_phase,current_phase_building_area,area_up_ground,area_under_ground,unit_count,total_buiding_area,contact_persion,mortgage,supporting_area,validate_from,validate_to,license_issue_date,distribute_of_residential_count,distribute_of_residential_area,distribute_of_bussiness_count,distribute_of_bussiness_area,distribute_of_office_count,distribute_of_office_area,distribute_of_parking_count,distribute_of_parking_area,distribute_of_other_count,distribute_of_other_area from pre_sell_license_data
entity.deltaImportQuery: select concat('psld_', id) as id,create_time,update_time,pre_sell_license_id,building_count,building_house,built_house,current_phase,current_phase_building_area,area_up_ground,area_under_ground,unit_count,total_buiding_area,contact_persion,mortgage,supporting_area,validate_from,validate_to,license_issue_date,distribute_of_residential_count,distribute_of_residential_area,distribute_of_bussiness_count,distribute_of_bussiness_area,distribute_of_office_count,distribute_of_office_area,distribute_of_parking_count,distribute_of_parking_area,distribute_of_other_count,distribute_of_other_area from pre_sell_license_data where id='${dih.delta.id}'
